title: "Natural Remedies for Rheumatic and Nerve Pain"
first_phrase: In the preceding text, the author describes various remedies to treat physical ailments such as rheumatic pain, which can be relieved through magnetizing and drinking a tea made from the herb "Wegwarttee." The author also provides instructions to treat nerve issues, which can often stem from emotional or psychological stress. In this last section, the author recommends a magnetically suggestive method to improve the patient's mood and prospects for healing by placing hands in specific areas of the body.

last_phrase: In conclusion, it is important to distinguish between rheumatism and pain caused by foot problems or nerve damage. Identifying the underlying causes of the ailment is crucial to finding effective treatment. Psychological distress, overexertion, and excessive consumption of stimulants can contribute to nerve pain. Magnetic-suggestive therapy can help alleviate symptoms, and applying Gottliebschen Hautfunktionsöl Nr. 6 or magnetized water can also be beneficial.
